title.rendered: Nordisk Vindkraft divests two wind farm projects to Spawer Kraft

content.rendered:
Nordisk Vindkraft has divested the wind farm projects Ängersjökölen and Sandtjärnberget located in Härjedalen municipality in Jämtland county to Spawer Kraft, which is owned by the Spanish wind and solar power developer Spanish Power. The projects comprise 16 wind turbine generators in total. The installed capacity can amount to 51 MW and the projects have the potential to produce renewable energy for approximately 30,000 households.

Nordisk Vindkraft is part of the RES group (Renewable Energy Systems) and is developing, financing, constructing and managing wind farms on behalf of its customers and itself on the Nordic market.

Nordisk Vindkraft was advised by Mannheimer Swartling in the transaction.
